name: @obscura/circuits
description: ZK circuits for Obscura private claims

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/claim.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/claim_0000.zkey
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/claim_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/claim_final.zkey build/ClaimVerifier.sol
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run export-vkey
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/claim_final.zkey build/claim_js/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
